drills.name: Bill Drill
drills.description: Draw and fire 6 rounds at a single target as fast as possible while maintaining all hits in the A-zone. Tests draw speed, trigger control, and recoil management.

drills.name: Failure Drill (Mozambique)
drills.description: Two shots to the body, one to the head. Also known as the Mozambique Drill. Tests transition speed and precision under stress.

drills.name: Draw to First Shot
drills.description: From concealment, draw and fire one accurate shot. Measures pure draw speed to first accurate hit on target.

drills.name: Dot Torture
drills.description: 50 rounds on 10 small circles at 3 yards. Must hit all 50 to pass. The ultimate accuracy and trigger control test. Start at 3 yards and move back as you master each distance.

drills.name: 5x5 Drill
drills.description: 5 shots, 5 seconds, 5-inch circle, 5 yards. From the holster, draw and place all 5 shots within a 5-inch circle in 5 seconds or less.

drills.name: 10-10-10 Drill
drills.description: 10 rounds, 10-inch circle, 10 yards in 10 seconds. A simple accuracy standard that tests consistency under mild time pressure.

drills.name: FAST Drill
drills.description: Fundamentals, Accuracy, and Speed Test. Draw, fire 2 shots on a 3x5 head box, reload, then 4 shots on an 8-inch body circle from 7 yards. All hits required.

drills.name: El Presidente
drills.description: Classic competition drill. Start facing away from 3 targets at 10 yards. On signal, turn, draw, and engage each target with 2 shots, reload, and engage each target with 2 more shots.

drills.name: Casino Drill
drills.description: 21 rounds at varying distances: 1 shot at 21 yards, 2 shots at 14 yards, 3 at 10 yards, 4 at 7 yards, 5 at 5 yards, and 6 at 3 yards. Tests accuracy across distances.
